name: Dr Kawashima's Devilish Brain Training: Can you stay focused?
synopsis: Developed in co-operation with neuroscientist Dr Ryuta Kawashima, Dr Kawashima's Devilish Brain Training: Can you stay focused? offers 30 exercises and minigames, with the core exercises dynamically adapting to create bespoke training programmes for all abilities. By offering a stiff challenge, Devilish Brain Training will constantly push you to stay focused and access short-term memories.
